body:
This is very odd, if I run `./timing.sh -test` directly at head it takes ~1m47 as expected.

If I run `go tool dist test shootout`, it takes ~30mins, but I've verified that the same command is being executed.
```
  │   ├─bash
  │   │   └─go tool dist test shootout
  │   │       ├─dist test shootout
  │   │       │   ├─time ./timing.sh -test
  │   │       │   │   └─bash ./timing.sh -test
  │   │       │   │       └─a.out
  │   │       │   │           └─{a.out}
  │   │       │   └─{dist}
  │   │       └─{go}
```
